oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Book of predictions organized on monthly basis. Some months omitted in this copy.
Title of book on f. 1r added by later hand.
According to colophon (f. 18r), copy completed at the beginning of Shawwāl 841 AH [April 1438 AD] in the hand of Yūnus ibn Saqqā.
One folio missing at the beginning.
Written in vocalized naskh, in one column, 11 lines per pages, in black rubricated in red. Words at beginning of sentences either in red or red overlined.
MS Turk 13. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Islamic calendar
Fortune-telling--Turkey
Astrology
Divination--Turkey
